Posts.Content: Aharrell07 wrote: I am a 26 yr old and I just found a knot under my Left nipple.  i did nurse my child for a year but i've been done for about 6+ m,onths and have not felt a clogged milk duct this large.  The knot feels round/oval and hard.  It's not sore, but it is wierd feeling.  Now that i have found it and worried about it, I do remember having a sharp pain here and there in my left brest. Felt like a needle in it.  It's about a CM in not 1 and 1/4 CM.  Please tell me what you think.  My mother has had cyst and not she has Breast Cancer.  I think that is the main reason I'm so worried.  I already had an appointment scheduled on July 2nd for my yearly, so I'm just waiting to find out what the doctor thinks then. Posts.Title: Question about lump/knot Aharrell07 Aharrell07
